headline: Market Minute 10-22-25- Metals Plunge While Media Talks Heat Up
summary: Gold and silver gave back more ground in the early going after an intense selloff yesterday. Equities and Treasuries are mostly flat, while crude oil and the dollar are rising modestly.

headline: How the Narrative Around Comcast Is Evolving Amid Fresh Analyst Reactions and Sector Shifts
summary: Comcast's fair value per share has recently been adjusted, dipping slightly from $39.18 to $38.91. Analysts also increased their discount rate from 8.21% to 8.22%. These modest changes reflect a balanced response to both favorable developments, such as improved broadband results and special media event revenues, as well as caution tied to ongoing sector pressures and competition. For investors following Comcast, it is important to track how these shifting valuations and analyst outlooks...
